ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS 2 Electric Double Probe (EDP) Spacecraft Potential, Level 2 (L2), Fast Mode, 31.25 ms Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, updated the RepositoryID, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220803

Standardized the ResourceName Format, Set AlternateName equal to the ProductKey, Revised the Acknowledgement, PublicationInfo Authors, and Contact Person list per request of the MMS EDP team, metadata updated to SPASE 2.5.0, reviewed by LFB 20230304

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB
Added MetadataRightsList and RightsList(s). Updated to 2.7.1. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Electric Double Probe, Dual Probe Spacecraft Potential, Level 2, Fast Survey Data. Spacecraft potential is etstimatrd by averaging measurements of the probe-to-spacecraft potential from several probes.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge R.E. Ergun, P.-A. Lindqvist, R.B. Torbert, N. Ahmadi, D.B. Graham, and J.L. Burch for use of these data

PublicationInfo.Authors: Ergun, Robert, E.; Lindqvist, Per-Arne; Torbert, Roy, B.; Ahmadi, Narges; Graham, Daniel, Bruce; Burch, James, L.
PublicationInfo.PublishedBy: Laboratory for Atmospheric and Space Physics; Space Physics Data Facility

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags, Interval Centered, in Terrestrial Time 2000 (TT2000)
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter exhibits an increasing monotonic progression.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Potential
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2

Parameter.Name: Average Probe to Spacecraft Potential
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Average of the Probe to Spacecraft Potential Values, Level 2, Fast Survey

Parameter.Name: Probe to Spacecraft Potential, Individual Probe
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Probe to Spacecraft Potential, Individual Probes, Level 2, Fast Survey

Parameter.Name: Status Bitmask
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Status Bitmask, Values Used: Bitmask and 0x001: True when probe(s) are disabled, Bitmask and 0x002: True when probe(s) have bad bias settings, Bitmask and 0x004: True when probe(s) are saturated, Bitmask and 0x008: True when probe(s) are saturated due to low density, Bitmask and 0x016: True when probe(s) are sweeping bias, Bitmask and 0x032: True when SDP probe(s) are in shadow from the ADP booms, Bitmask and 0x064: True when ASPOC is emitting non-zero current

Parameter.Name: Data Quality indicator
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: MMS2_EDP_EPOCH_FAST_L2
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Indicator: 4, Best; 3, Good; 2, Data OK, Use with some Caution; 1, Bad Data, Use with Caution; 0, Really Bad Data or No Data

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time Delta Plus/Minus
Parameter.Description: The Time Interval of Data Measurements is given by the Epoch Time Tags and Delta Plus/Minus
